lender.name: Kyle@LakelandAerial.com
lender.loan_because: I give one $25 Kiva.org gift certificate back to the customer, via email, for every $225 they spend at LakelandAerial.com (excluding tax). During my several semesters abroad and later as a Fulbright scholar I witnessed the vicious cycle of abject poverty, disease, hopelessness, & crime. I believe in the power of private enterprise to turn this cycle inside-out, so I believe in Kiva.org.
lender.occupational_info: I shoot photos from light aircraft. I shoot lakes, businesses, farms, & homes, and market framed aerial photos to the owners. My work has to be more detailed than satellite photography, which is my primary competition, and cheaper than do-it-yourself aerial photos, in order to create value.

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: I think it wil help worldpeace.

lender.name: Suchi
lender.loan_because:
Both me and my husband started our Tea Business almost 10 yrs ago. Getting money from people or friends was not easy when we needed the most. The only solution we and most of other people are left with is going to the banks and you are lucky if you get approved not to mention the amount of time spent on paper work. And if you do and you are all excited till you have to start paying back with big interest on top of what you borrow. So I can totally understand what these people are going through.
KIVA is doing such a wonderful job by lending money with no interest :-) to so many entrepreneurs' all over the world. Moreover its such a small amount which I had no problem coming up with. It costs more than $25 for a couple to go to a movie these days. So why not help someone start their own business and be part of making their dreams come true.
lender.occupational_info: I own a Tea Business with my husband and am also a professional web designer. Good tea and design keeps me going everyday. Escape today's hectic pace or treat yourself or your favourite tea lover with a nourishing cup of premium quality gourmet teas in beautiful specialty containers. Enter our world of teas.

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: I know how hard it is to struggle with starting a business, and I want to help support other small business owners, especially entrepreneurs who are dealing with more difficult circumstances than I ever did. I've been blessed in life and want to pay it forward.

lender.loan_because: I loan for my nieces and nephews Lauren, Rachel, Evan, Ryan, to foster their appreciation for what they have and what they can give.

lender.name: Ric Cuthbertson
lender.loan_because:
I know first-hand what its like to seek financing for a new venture and have been very fortunate over the years in securing the funds needed to start businesses thanks to my good friends, family and successful and supportive business leaders in my community.
In my experience, financial institutions (The Banks) are horribly risk averse and do not, (by design) help those who don't already have the financial assets to support or create a new venture--they are designed to help those who, typically, already have the resources. Getting a business loan for a start up of any size in North America is a huge challenge and I can only imagine how tough it would be for an entrepreneur in a developing country, with little or no assets to speak of, to get a loan of any kind.
I believe the microfinance loan concept combined with the power of the internet can truly transform lives--both that of the lender as well as the entrepreneur. I encourage everyone who has the financial means to consider making a microfinance loan either for themselves or as a gift to family and friends.

lender.name: Alison
lender.loan_because: I think Kiva is a powerful and sustainable way to help others make a better life for themselves. It's a very inspiring concept!

lender.name: IvesWilliamsFamily
lender.loan_because: Our family wants to use Kiva for our Christmas gift giving. We make donations instead of sending presents
lender.occupational_info: We are a family who wishes the best to the people getting Kiva loans.

lender.occupational_info: I am studying International Relations, Political Science, and Social Entrepreneurship at the University of North Carolina.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: My husband was fortunate enough to be able to start his own company. I would like to help people who do not have the resources to do this.
lender.occupational_info: I help people after they have had an illness or injury. If they are too weak to get out of bed and walk, I help them exercise their muscles and how to walk again. They may need crutches or a cane. Or they may need to use a wheelchair.

lender.name: Rob & Janelle
lender.loan_because: it teaches our four children about other cultures, other people, different economic situations. We want to help people and believe the loans are a way to make others responsible for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Mortgage Associate who helps people get loans (called mortgages) to own their own homes.

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: I recently started my own business, and I want to help others do the same.

lender.name: Bob and Marley
lender.loan_because: It is the best gift...and it makes perfect sense to help people realize their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: Bob is a former college president. Marley is a nurse. This is a great program that my family has gotten us involved in. Giving the gift of hope by helping people get the capital they need to make their lives better.

lender.name: Lance
lender.loan_because: everybody deserves the opportunity to pursue their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I provide to businesses the technology and tools that help them realize their potential.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me so much with his love and I want to show his love to others.
lender.occupational_info: My work is to tell others about Jesus Christ. He is the only one that can truly satisfy our needs.

lender.name: Faye
lender.loan_because: We are all responsible for each other.

lender.name: Joshua
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a loan at some point!

lender.name: Jacob
lender.loan_because: Helping someone create their own income is priceless.
lender.occupational_info: Student.

lender.name: Rick
lender.loan_because: family health indicies improve as poor women take charge of their financial destiny
lender.occupational_info: Promote healthy habits

lender.name: Brian & Iris
lender.loan_because: We want to be a part of a social network whose mission is to help people eager to accomplish their goals.
lender.occupational_info: Iris is in the wine business and Brian finances apartment communities.

lender.name: GAM
lender.loan_because: People around the world are good and can be inspirational, especially when you believe in them.
lender.occupational_info: Lucky.

lender.name: hjd3
lender.loan_because: In the words of Gandhi "Be the change you want to see in the world".
lender.occupational_info: Helping to connect people through technology.

lender.name: Deirdre
lender.loan_because: I want the whole world to be healthy, happy, and self sufficient. This is one way to help people and allow them to maintain their dignity and build their self esteem. World peace depends on this. Lending through Kiva is one more way to be a good example to my children (pictured.)
lender.occupational_info: I work in a hospital where I care for sick and premature babies.

lender.name: Genie
lender.loan_because: This is such a worthwhile way of giving to people who are in need and trying to better the lives of their family. I try to select people from countries I have visited.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: We have a responsibility in caring for each other and fulfilling that responsibility is pure joy.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: Sharing is good.
lender.occupational_info: I love to create things that make people smile.

lender.name: Naomi
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to make a difference in someone else's life.

lender.name: Danielle Kristen Odom
lender.occupation: Senior Lab Asst, Molecular Bio - Cancer Research
lender.loan_because:
I believe that we are all global citizens of one planet and that we should treat others as we wish ourselves to be treated and that starts with two common, universal languages, Respect and Compassion.
Respect starts with the ethic of reciprocity, "the Golden Rule" or the basis of human rights. Compassion starts with a desire to relieve suffering of others.
This is why I loan. God bless.
As of Saturday August 22, 2009 I added an additional $50 to my lending credit in memory of my Granddad who passed away on this day. With my granddad as an inspiration, I hope to continue to spread the love, generosity, compassion and optimism that he willingly shared with everyone. May he rest in peace.

lender.name: AshishB.
lender.loan_because: this concept is fool proof, honest and not really a "charity" cause....love the concept!!!

lender.name: Laura K
lender.loan_because: God and people have been generous with me and I want to be generous with others. I believe microloans are an effective way to encourage self-sufficiency and spread economic freedom.
lender.occupational_info: I play piano for a church, accompany school choirs, teach piano lessons, direct a children's choir, perform concerts, write music, and record CDs.

lender.name: Alex G
lender.loan_because: I would like to help better the human condition by assisting entrepreneurial hopes wherever in the world they may exist.

lender.name: amy and joe
lender.loan_because: We have been on the receiving end of loans over the years, and it's nice to be the lender for a change. We also lived in Central America for three years, and we just wanted to give something back to this part of the world.

lender.name: Ana
lender.loan_because: To help people.

lender.name: Harvey
lender.loan_because: I visited Africa in 2007 and saw first hand what life is like there. I am happy to help a person wanting to make a better life for themselves.

lender.name: Celia
lender.loan_because: ... I can. I have a lot to be grateful for, and I want to be part of good things in someone else's life too. As I see it, we're all part of each other in one world, and it's good to feel this solidarity.
lender.occupational_info: My work is about listening respectfully to people who are troubled or lost in their lives and working with them to release their potential to be more than they are at present.

lender.name: CJ Lee
lender.loan_because: It's an opportunity to touch the world.
lender.occupational_info: Our family participates in charity, foster parenting children and adults, education, business, websites, counseling and real estate.

lender.name: Darlene
lender.occupation: owner Country Conceesions quilt shop in Ontario

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: I learned a long time ago that when you are in a position to help others, paying it forward is the right thing to do. Positive intention brings about positive outcomes.
lender.occupational_info: I am an educator. I teach 7th and 8th grade reading and writing. My job is to inspire my students to want to reach their full potential...to stretch beyond what they think they are capable of doing...even if it is hard. This has been a hard year for me...diagnosed with breast cancer 10/10/07...but my students have seen that I'm a fighter even though it's hard at times...and I want them to know that my situation isn't nearly as rough as those who may walk a tougher road...struggling for the basic things that they, my students, often take for granted.

lender.name: Pam & David
lender.loan_because: My wife and I want to make a positive difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I design, build, and test spacecraft. The most recent project I worked on, New Horizons, will reach the planet Pluto in eight years.

lender.name: Leslee
lender.loan_because: I feel grateful to be able to do so.

lender.name: Ren
lender.loan_because: Kiva provides a proven and effective channel through which development assistance funds can reach those truly in need. Micro-credit works; a small loan can change someone's life.

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: I'm blessed in so many ways, that I feel it's my obligation to provide as many opportunites as I can to others.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a middle school math teacher.

lender.name: Joanna
lender.loan_because: I can. I must.

lender.name: Todd
lender.loan_because: everything must change
lender.occupational_info: design & develop web-based software systems

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because: Building businesses at the grassroots level. In places where small business development is the bases from which a middle class is built. A strong middle class is the key to all people of a region being able to live a better life.
lender.occupational_info: life is a quest. A game for the strong. Always worth living. Over too soon.

lender.name: Jeremy
lender.loan_because: I believe.
lender.occupational_info: Dedicated to public service.

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: the loan has been made in my name as an Christmas gift from my parents

lender.name: Tiffany Rose Naputi
lender.loan_because: my life has taken me from the sleepy southern village of Maloloj on isla Guahan in the Marianas Islands of Micronesia to the San Francisco Bay Area and I'd like to share my resources with my entrepreneurial brothers and sisters in the Pacific region.
lender.occupational_info: I work as the director of finance and operations for a youth center that serves low-income lgbtq youth of color in the San Francisco Bay Area. I am also heavily involved in the Asian Pacific Islander progressive women's movement. I have testified in the past to the U.N. on issues pertaining to Guam and will testify in Congress in 2008 on issues pertaining to the Commonwealth of the Northern Marianas Islands and other freely associated Pacific Island States.

lender.name: Holly
lender.occupation: Home School Teacher & Personal Care Attendant
lender.loan_because: And the King will answer them, 'Truly, I say to you, as you did it to one of the least of these my brothers, you did it to me.'
lender.occupational_info: I've enjoyed homeschooling our children the past 6 years; our youngest graduates this summer. I also work as a Personal Care Attendant for a young woman who was in a serious car accident last fall.

lender.name: John A
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Helping to improve healthcare and medical knowledge for Northern California and throughout the world. Helping to improve the efficiency of other medical researchers within the Kaiser organization.

lender.name: Kay & Kerry
lender.loan_because: We all need a little help some times and Kiva is a great way to help entrepreneurs expand their small business.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: I think business development is key to sustained poverty reduction.

lender.name: Bry & Miche
lender.occupational_info: I am a former editor and consultant in the field of international population and family planning.

lender.name: Ze Carlos & Sofia
lender.loan_because: its important for us

lender.name: Noel
lender.loan_because: its the least I can do.
lender.occupational_info: graduate student.

lender.name: alf
lender.loan_because: we're all in this together.
